commands.name: az acat report webhook create
commands.summary: Create a new AppComplianceAutomation webhook or update an exiting AppComplianceAutomation webhook.
commands.syntax:
az acat report webhook create --payload-url
                              --report-name
                              --webhook-name
                              [--content-type-hidden {application/json}]
                              [--disable {false, true}]
                              [--enable-ssl {false, true}]
                              [--events]
                              [--secret]
                              [--trigger-mode {all, customize}]

commands.name: az acat report webhook show
commands.summary: Get the AppComplianceAutomation webhook and its properties.

commands.name: az acat report webhook update
commands.syntax:
az acat report webhook update --report-name
                              --webhook-name
                              [--content-type {application/json}]
                              [--disable {false, true}]
                              [--enable-ssl {false, true}]
                              [--events-hidden]
                              [--payload-url-hidden]
                              [--secret]
                              [--trigger-mode {all, customize}]
